name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Relay Auto Booker Refresher Rocket Pro

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Professional Relay Auto Booker and Refresher for Amazon Relay.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Welcome to Amazon Relay Refresher and Auto Booker Rocket Pro , your ultimate solution for maximizing earnings, streamlining bookings, and enhancing productivity on the Amazon Relay loadboard. Works in the US, EU, GB, CA and any country where Amazon Relay is available.
NEW Oct 2024 UPDATE! Compatible with the latest Loadboard interface.


✔ 3 intuitive booking modes: Alert, Search, and Auto-book
✔ Refresher (Alert mode) is FREE to use!
✔ Detailed User Guide with screenshots
✔ Maintain your Rocket filters even through page reloads
✔ Advanced filtering options: Distance, Stem time, Departure Time, Deadhead, Stops, Payout, and Locations; NEW: Max Duration and Start Within.
✔ Whitelist or exclude locations by state, postal code, Amazon facility code or country (beta)
✔ Instantly view all stops and trip details with the auto-expanding feature
✔ Make informed decisions with load type for each leg of the trip
✔ One-click book button
✔ Multi-row filters (NEW May 2024).
✔ Compatible with Android browsers that support Chrome extensions.

Alert Mode: Receive real-time notifications with sound alerts for new trips or price changes. Customize notification thresholds and refresh speeds in Settings.

Search Mode: Fine-tune your searches with customizable filters including Max Departure Time, Distance, Stem Time, Deadhead, Stops, Payout, and Locations. Practice here before diving into Autobook mode. 

Autobook Mode: Let automation work for you. Set your criteria, specify the quantity of trips you want, and watch as the extension automatically books matching trips.

Advanced settings for Amazon Relay Loadboard:
✔ Refresh Speed: Adjust the refresh rate for optimal performance while avoiding Amazon's request limitations.
✔ Price Change Alert: Set thresholds to receive notifications for significant payout increases.
✔ Trailer Type: Specify trailer requirements for bookings.
✔ Fast Book: Streamline bookings with one-click confirmation.
✔ Trip Details: View detailed trip information
✔ Hide Refresh Results: Prevent loadboard crashes by hiding results during refreshes.
✔ Only Amazon Locations filter
✔ Hide Similar Trips: Reduce server requests by turning off similar trip recommendations.

Empower your Amazon Relay experience with Amazon Rocket Relay Refresher and Auto Booker. To get started, we offer a 7-day free trial. After the trial, pricing is $49.99/month, with the option to cancel your subscription online anytime. Payment is securely processed through Stripe.com. If you need support, don't hesitate to contact us at amazonrocketrelay@gmail.com, and be sure to share your experience with us. For updates, news, and future tools, visit https://rocketrelaybooker.com.
Visit rocketrelaybooker.com for updates, news, and future tools.
